title: The God of Small Things
description: The God of Small Things – though a fairly recent book – it explores caste, sexism, colonialism and the strange unspoken rules that tie Indian families together.

title: The Handmaid’s Tale
description: Despite the passage of time, I have not forgotten how prescient The Handmaid’s Tale was, and how prescient it felt.

title: Blood Meridian
description: McCarthy is certainly one of the finest living authors in the world today and this novel is his best...

title: A Fine Balance
description: This is the one book that whisked me away to India.
